Helpers

Helpers are classes created to override some CSS properties in your HTML. Just add them in the HTML class of your element.

File to include

@include "helpers";

How to use them

CSS Class
Effect
CSS Class
Effect

.text-left

Align text on the left.

.text-center

Align text in the center.

.text-right

Align text on the right.

.clear-float

Add a float none.

.hidden

Add a display none.

.no-marg

Set all the margins to 0.

.no-marg-top

Set the margin-top to 0.

.no-marg-bottom

Set the margin-bottom to 0.

.no-marg-left

Set the margin-left to 0.

.no-marg-right

Set the margin-right to 0.

.no-padd

Set all the paddings to 0.

.no-padd-top

Set the padding-top to 0.

.no-padd-bottom

Set the padding-bottom to 0.

.no-padd-left

Set the padding-left to 0.

.no-padd-right

Set the padding-right to 0.

.no-select

Prevent the user to select the element.

.clearfix

Add a 5px height line and clears both sides between two elements.

Shadow colors helpers
On bright backgrounds the shadow must not be brighter than grayscale 40.

Shadow color
CSS Class
Shadow color
CSS Class

.shadow-bottom-secondary

.shadow-bottom-danger

.shadow-bottom-success
